item.description:
The Waterfire in Providence, RI is a local spectacular that never ceases to amaze and entertain. And there's always a bunch of socializing and partying around the river (where the Waterfire takes place) - makes it a great evening of fun.

For more info, see Waterfire

Folks will most probably meet up at one of the local restaurants, like Citron. If you want to meet up with our event hostess (Linda, our Newsletter Editor & Rhode Island Social Instigator!), please e-mail Linda at editor@hubtall.org and she will provide her contact info & further instructions.

BBTC Members: See the October Newsletter for additional information, directions and tips from Linda.

Not yet a BBTC Member?
Take the plunge & sign up for our Newsletter, house parties, weekends away, other TCI Club events, TCI Convention and more (all available once you're a fully-fledged BBTC Member).
Fill in Membership Form & PayPal your Membership Dues ($45 per Individual) to treasurer@hubtall.org and you'll be on your way to many great Tall Adventures!

Any questions? E-mail treasurer@hubtall.org or meetup@hubtall.org
item.name: Waterfire Evening In Providence, RI
